name: GeoHazards Society
briefDescription: GeoHazards Society (GHS) is a not-for-profit organisation working towards making the country´s most vulnerable communities safer from natural and other hazards, through preparedness and mitigation. Along with it´s international partner organisation, GeoHazards International (www.geohaz.org) ,the organisation has been working in partnership with government organizations and Corporate Sectors in conducting programmes on Community Preparedness, School Safety, Hospital Safety, engineers training programmes, business continuity planning etc.
